name: The Sad Times
description:
-To Set the Stage-

Tragedy has struck the once peaceful "Happy Town". Barbarians in the night have sacked the town and killed everyone... except you the local Bard.

-Goal-

Save the townspeople's souls and bury what's left of them... Perhaps even exact revenge in their name!

-Controls-

Movement: WASD

Fight Back with MUSIC!: E

Collect Object(s): E

Bury the remains: F

Tip: Lower your enemies' HP faster than they lower yours!

--Special Notes--

This game was developed for PIMA Spring Class GAM102 FinalJam.

This game was based on the world of Happy Times developed by: Blake Gustafson.

--Special Notes--

--Pain Points--

Almost a must to play on full screen...

The U/I is currently not working with me very well... so the player's Health bar is centered directly on the player rather than at the lower half of the screen for itch.io. 

and...
